content:
As an AI language model, I don't have access to information about your local area, but here are some general ideas on how to find traditional ingredients for these recipes:

1. Look for specialty food stores that carry international ingredients. Some larger grocery stores may have an international section that carries ingredients for Russian recipes.

2. Try searching online for specialty shops that sell Russian ingredients. You may find online stores that offer international shipping or stores that are located near your area.

3. Check out local farmers' markets or specialty food fairs. These events may offer a unique selection of ingredients that are hard to find in regular stores.

4. Consider growing some of the ingredients yourself. For example, you could grow herbs like dill or parsley in a small garden, or try your hand at raising a chicken for fresh eggs.

Additionally, you can also ask local Russian communities or cultural associations for recommendations on where to find authentic ingredients for traditional recipes. They may be able to offer recommendations or even sell the ingredients themselves.
